definition: traceable to the same stock (idiom); of a common origin (of trends, ideas etc)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive

sentences.english: The views of the Three Generation Leading Group share the same root and keep pace with times.
sentences.chinese: 三代中央領導集體的發展觀既一脈相承，又與時俱進。

sentences.english: Reinforcing the advancement construction of the party is constant in its history.
sentences.chinese: 加強黨的先進性建設在黨的歷史上是一脈相承的。

sentences.english: Longdong Plying belongs to shadow plays in the Qin and Jin Dynasty, and its modelling methods are the same as these of Shanxi.
sentences.chinese: 隴東皮影屬秦晉影戲，造型方法和陝西皮影一脈相承。

sentences.english: Yuexiang Shu's life thoughts and the ideas of poem creation can be traced to the same origin.
sentences.chinese: 舒嶽祥的思想與他的詩歌創作是一脈相承的。

sentences.english: The thoughts of the leaders of three generations to realize modernization come down in one continuous line.
sentences.chinese: 三代領導人的現代化建設思想一脈相承。

definition: lit. source is distant and the flow is long (idiom); fig. sth goes back to the dim and distant past/a lot of water has flowed under the bridge since then
prosperity and decline (of a kingdom)/rise and fall
passed on from generation to generation (idiom); to hand down
